bug.author: devilemperor
bug.description:
Hello, When I try to use: dreampower checkpoints download I get that error:
Downloading https://cdn.dreamnet.tech/releases/checkpoints/v0.0.1.zip [INFO] Extracting C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpbf5e3x1e\v0.0.1.zip [ERROR] stat: path should be string, bytes, os.PathLike or integer, not dict [ERROR] Something Gone Bad Download Downloading The Checkpoints
Enviroment:
Version 1.2.2 OS: Windows 10 1909
Thanks.

comments.comment: fixed in canary branch, will be part of next minor release.
